welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pulilan, Philippines! Get ready to experience the charm of our town known for its colorful fiestas, delicious local delicacies, and picturesque countryside. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Pulilan has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Shakey’s
restaurants.description: Shakey’s is a pizzeria located in Pulilan.
restaurants.address: Dona Remedios Trinidad Hwy (at Plaridel-Pulilan Diversion Rd), 3005 Pulilan, Bulacan
